author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r28379, fixing a compilation warning:

author: pburba
msg: Comment tweak merge_tests.py 'normalized mergeinfo is recorded on subtrees'

author: pburba
msg: If you inherit empty mergeinfo, you inherit empty mergeinfo.  Really.
(svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo):  If a path inherits empty mergeinfo we
correctly return an empty hash, but prior to this change we reported that
the path didn't inherit anything because the hash returned was empty(!).
